@dev Disallow payments to this contract directly

bidOnAuction(uint256).details: Bidder sends bid on an auctionAuction should be active and not endedRefund previous bidder if a new bid is valid and placed.

params._auctionId: uint ID of the created auction

cancelAuction(uint256).details: Cancels an ongoing auction by the ownerDeed is transfered back to the auction ownerBidder is refunded with the initial amount

params._auctionId: uint ID of the created auction

createAuction(address,uint256,string,str.details: Creates an auction with the given informatin

params._blockDeadline: uint is the timestamp in which the auction expires
params._deedId: uint256 of the deed registered in Deed
params._startPrice: uint256 starting price of the auction

returns._0: bool whether the auction is created

finalizeAuction(uint256).details: Finalized an ended auctionThe auction should be ended, and there should be at least one bidOn success Deed is transfered to bidder and auction owner gets the amount

params._auctionId: uint ID of the created auction

getAuctionsCountOfOwner(address).details: Gets the total number of auctions owned by an address

getAuctionsOf(address).details: Gets an array of owned auctions

getBidsCount(uint256).details: Gets the bid counts of a given auction

returns._0: amount uint256, address of last bidder

devdoc.title: Auction Repository This contracts allows auctions to be created for non-fungible tokens Moreover, it includes the basic functionalities of an auction house
